name: R. S. Meir
content: Ron Meir | Electrical and Computer Engineering, Technion Professor in the Viterbi Faculty of Electrical and Computer Engineering at the Technion and Skillman Chair in Biomedical Sciences. Associated with the Network Biology Research Laboratories. Main areas of interest: Information processing, learning and control in natural and artificial systems, continual learning, out of distribution learning, emergent communication. “The greatest obstacle to discovery is not ignorance — it is the illusion of knowledge.” Daniel Boorstin
